definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: McCain's family tree includes Scots-Irish and English ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 麦凯恩的族谱，包括苏格兰，爱尔兰和英国的祖先。

sentences.english: Immigrant genealogy society-information on the society and its german emphasis.
sentences.chinese: 移民社会的族谱资料，对社会和其德国重视。

sentences.english: You may wonder why I should write a genealogy.
sentences.chinese: 你或许会好奇，我为什么会为自己建立族谱？

sentences.english: We want to have the option to determine what information is displayed in the downline genealogies .
sentences.chinese: 我们希望有选择，以确定哪些信息是在下线族谱显示。

sentences.english: His style was characterized with simplicity and truth can be reflected in his compiling of the genealogy tree of Huizhou.
sentences.chinese: 他对于徽州族谱的撰修也表现出朴实求真的风格。

sentences.english: Your family tree may look quite different than you expected.
sentences.chinese: 你的族谱可能和你想象向背。

sentences.english: But I didn't ask for a family tree.
sentences.chinese: 但我没有规定必须要画族谱。

sentences.english: He lays stress on genealogical studies and the social reality.
sentences.chinese: 李华重视族谱学与社会实情。

sentences.english: This is the genealogy of the Sun family clan in Longmen.
sentences.chinese: 这就是龙门镇的孙氏族谱。

sentences.english: Where having does Yong Ning "the land clan composes " sell Guangxi?
sentences.chinese: 广西邕宁《陆氏族谱》在哪有卖？

definition: genealogy/family tree/same as 譜牒|谱牒
general history of a county/county annals
